recommended_search_strategy: Start with public academic sources (IEEE, arXiv, SAE) for technical foundation. Use financial research for market sizing and forecasts. Cross-reference with industry sources for real-world adoption data. Validate technical specifications against standards. Create alerts for quarterly earnings calls from key semiconductor vendors (NVDA, QCOM, INTC, MBLY) and Tier-1 suppliers (Continental, Bosch, Aptiv). Monitor patent filings through Google Patents for emerging technologies.
confidence_rationale: Sources represent authoritative voices across all required categories. Mix of technical depth (IEEE, SAE), market intelligence (financial research), real-world data (industry), and regulatory requirements (standards). Combination of free and subscription sources provides comprehensive coverage while being cost-effective for different research budgets.
